metadata.Title: CVE-2012-0523 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle Grid Engine component in Oracle SunProducts Suite 6.1 and 6.2 allows local users to affect confidentiality,integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to sgepasswd.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0523` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gridengine-client - 6.2u5-7.3
gridengine-common - 6.2u5-7.3
gridengine-drmaa1.0 - 6.2u5-7.3
gridengine-exec - 6.2u5-7.3
gridengine-master - 6.2u5-7.3
gridengine-qmon - 6.2u5-7.3
libdrmaa1.0-java - 6.2u5-7.3
libdrmaa1.0-ruby - 6.2u5-7.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: gridengine package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.2u5-7.3').
